title: Replace logo with uploaded Neroxa AI image

requirements.text: Replace the current application logo with the uploaded Neroxa AI logo image (Gemini_Generated_Image_cjqrvscjqr-1.png) showing a golden figure reading surrounded by floating books against a starry blue background
acceptanceCriteria: The uploaded Neroxa AI logo image is used as the primary logo in the Header component
The logo displays correctly in both light and dark themes
The logo maintains proper aspect ratio and sizing

requirements.text: Update all branding references from 'Vantior AI' to 'Neroxa AI' throughout the application
acceptanceCriteria: All text references to 'Vantior AI' are replaced with 'Neroxa AI'
The application title and meta tags reflect the new branding
The PWA manifest is updated with the new name

nonGoals: Do not change the functionality of any existing features
Do not modify the color scheme or overall design beyond the logo replacement
